```{r}
wssplot <- function(data, nc=15, seed=1234){
  wss <- (nrow(data)-1)*sum(apply(data,2,var))
  for (i in 2:nc){
    set.seed(seed)
    wss[i] <- sum(kmeans(data, centers=i)$withinss)}
  plot(1:nc, wss, type="b", xlab="Number of Clusters",
       ylab="Within groups sum of squares")}
```

```{r}
gc <- ag[["VisitFrequency"]][["get"]]
rownames(gc) <- 1:nrow(gc)

gc0 <- gc[,which(sapply(names(gc),function(x) is.numeric(gc[,x])))] #filter on numeric variables
gc0 <- gc0[,which(!names(gc0) %in% "nb_users_returning")] #useless variable
gc0 <- scale(gc0)

```

```{r}
#clustering K-Means
wssplot(gc0, nc=6)
```

```{r}
k <- kmeans(gc0,2) #k=2
# k <- kmeans(gc0,3) #k=3
```

```{r}
library(cluster)
clusplot(gc0, k$cluster, main='2D representation of the Cluster solution',
         color=TRUE, shade=TRUE,
         labels=2, lines=0)
```
